dashboard.label: Certification Alerts
dashboard.description: Certification Alerts: Looks at certs about to expire

search.query: |inputlookup website_expirations.csv | eval cert_expiration = strptime('cert_expiration', "%b %d %T %Y") |eval current_time=now(),"Days Until Expiration"=(cert_expiration-current_time)/86400 |convert ctime(cert_expiration) | convert ctime(current_time) |rename cert_expiration as "Cert Expiration", url as URL, port as Port, current_time as "Current Time"
